thread.title: Five healthy things you can do this weekend | Zee News
thread.title_full: Five healthy things you can do this weekend | Zee News

title: Five healthy things you can do this weekend | Zee News
text:
Five healthy things you can do this weekend By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 12:28 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
Mumbai: Thank God it’s Friday! You will soon get to enjoy your most loved days – Saturday and Sunday! But if you wish to make constructive use of this weekend to become healthier, then you must first be determined to do so. 
Here, we have a few tips for you that will help you become healthier. 
Check out the video embedded below: 
Remember, you must aim at doing these things regularly every weekend to achieve your health goals. First Published: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 12:28 More from zeenews
